sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { ListGroup } from 'reactstrap'
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom';

function Menu(){
  let previousButton = null;
  function changeColor(buttonId) {
    let button = document.getElementById(buttonId);

    if (previousButton !== null) {
      previousButton.style.backgroundColor =
        "white"; /* Revert the previous button color to blue */
    }

    button.style.backgroundColor =
      "rgb(0, 102, 255)"; /* Change the color of the current button to red */
    previousButton = button;
  }
  
    return (
      <ListGroup>
        <Link
          id="myButton1"
          className="list-group-item list-group-item-action"
          tag="a"
          to="/"
          action
        >
          Home
        </Link>
        <Link
          id="myButton2"
          className="list-group-item list-group-item-action"
          tag="a"
          onClick={() => changeColor("myButton2")}
          to="/add-course"
          action
        >
          Add Course
        </Link>
        <Link
          id="myButton3"
          className="list-group-item list-group-item-action"
          tag="a"
          onClick={() => changeColor("myButton3")}
          to="/view-courses"
          action
        >
          View Courses
        </Link>
        <Link
          id="myButton4"
          className="list-group-item list-group-item-action"
          tag="a"
          onClick={() => changeColor("myButton4")}
          to="/about-us"
          action
        >
          About Us
        </Link>
        <Link
          id="myButton5"
          className="list-group-item list-group-item-action"
          tag="a"
          onClick={() => changeColor("myButton5")}
          to="/contact-us"
          action
        >
          Contact Us
        </Link>
      </ListGroup>
    ); 
}

export default Menu;
